  • Method Details

    • createElectionInfo

      public String createElectionInfo(org.hyperledger.fabric.contract.Context ctx, String goal, Long votersNumber, LocalDateTime startingDate, LocalDateTime endingDate, List<it.unibo.ds.core.utils.Choice> choices)
      Create a ElectionInfo.
      Parameters:
      ctx - The Context.
      goal - The goal of the ElectionInfo to build.
      votersNumber - The number of voters that could cast a vote in the ElectionInfo to build.
      startingDate - The LocalDateTime representing the start of the possibility to cast a vote in the ElectionInfo to build.
      endingDate - The LocalDateTime representing the end of the possibility to cast a vote in the ElectionInfo to build.
      choices - The List of Choice that the ElectionInfo to build has.
      Returns:
      The String representing the electionId of the ElectionInfo built.

    • getAllAssets

      public String getAllAssets(org.hyperledger.fabric.contract.Context ctx)
      Return all the existing ElectionInfos.
      Parameters:
      ctx - The Context.
      Returns:
